explains: n. 使人全神贯注的事物，使人入神的事物；全神贯注，入神

sentences.en: The pictures belong to an era when there was a preoccupation with high society.
sentences.cn: 这些图片源于上层社会占据主流的时代。

sentences.en: She spoke slowly, in a state of preoccupation.
sentences.cn: 她说话慢吞吞的，显得心事重重。

sentences.en: She found his preoccupation with money irritating.
sentences.cn: 她对他一心只想着钱感到很厌烦。
